item.title: World War II Flying Aces - Scraping a Wikipedia table (part 1)
item.description: This post covers how to scrape a Wikipedia table of World War II (WWII) flying aces, store it in an R data frame, and export these data into a comma-separated values (.csv) file. The data I want to download a table of World War II flying aces from Wikipedia. To do this I will need functions from xml2, rvest, dplyr, stringr, lubridate, and readr. library(xml2) library(rvest) library(tidyverse) Download html page into object in R First I want to store the web url into a string vector in R.
